Name: Bomb Bowling 2
About the game: Bomb Bowling 2 is an indie puzzle game with physics. Knock the pins off the screen using explosions. Keep track of what is happening and then select the moment for the accurate click. The sequel of the Bomb Bowling. 50 levels with new contents. Hone your skills before a new challenges!
